name.title: Service name
name.description: The name of the service instance

user.title: User
user.description: [NOOP] The user that the service will run as is defined by docker image. Don't modify it

principal.title: Custom principal (optional)
principal.description: The principal for the service instance, or empty to use the default.

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

virtual_network_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin. Comma-separated key:value pairs. For example: k_0:v_0,k_1:v_1,...,k_n:v_n

secret_name.title: Credential secret name (optional)
secret_name.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

mesos_api_version.description: Configures the Mesos API version to use. Possible values: V0 (non-HTTP), V1 (HTTP)

count.title: Node count
count.description: Number of Template pods to run

placement_constraint.title: Placement constraint
placement_constraint.description: Marathon-style placement constraint for nodes. Example: 'hostname:UNIQUE'. By the way since the framework requires specific ports UNIQUE constraints is implicit.

virtual_network.description: Name of virtual network to join

cni_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to CNI plugin. Comma-seperated key:value pairs. For example [k_0:v_0,k_1:v_1,...,k_n:v_n]

mem.title: Memory size (MB)
mem.description: XXX. Fix me - ROOT support only. Template pod mem requirements (in MB)

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: Template pod persistent disk requirements (in MB)

disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS

epmd_port.title: AMQP port
epmd_port.description: The port where rabbitmq will listen for processing messages

amqp_port.title: AMQP port
amqp_port.description: The port where rabbitmq will listen for processing messages

amqp_tls_port.title: AMQP TLS port
amqp_tls_port.description: The port where rabbitmq will listen for processing messages

dist_port.title: AMQP port
dist_port.description: The port where rabbitmq will listen for clustering

mgmt_port.title: RabbitMQ HTTTP listener port
mgmt_port.description: The port where rabbitmq management console will listen

erlang_cookie.title: Erlang cookie
erlang_cookie.description: The port where rabbitmq will listen

etcd_endpoint.title: etcd cluster endpoint
etcd_endpoint.description: SRV entry of the etcd cluster

etcd_proxy_port.title: etcd cluster endpoint
etcd_proxy_port.description: SRV entry of the etcd cluster
